lead_paragraph: Thomas Hardin, who worked for the hedge fund Lanexa Management, got some of his tips from the same woman who gave information to Galleon’s founder.

headline.main: Onetime Mystery Informant in Galleon Insider Trading Case Gets No Jail Time
headline.print_headline: Onetime Mystery Informant in Galleon Insider Trading Case Gets No Jail Time

snippet: Thomas Hardin, who worked for the hedge fund Lanexa Management, got some of his tips from the same woman who gave information to Galleon’s founder.
